examples: He is not exactly the shy and retiring type.
No es exactamente del tipo tímido y retraído.
Don't be shy—come and say hello.
No seas tímido, ven a saludar.
She was too shy to ask anyone for help.
Era demasiado tímida para pedir ayuda a nadie.
As a teenager I was painfully shy.
Cuando era adolescente, era tremendamente tímido.
